author: TechHut
description:
Running DeepSeek R1 on the Raspberry Pi using their distilled 1.5b model is actually a fairly decent experience. Let's go over how to get this done AND install OpenWebUI for a nice chat tool.

Commands here: https://medium.com/@TechHutTV/run-deepseek-r1-on-a-raspberry-pi-5-e58902a6dbbc
